ExampleApp Hello blank fragment Example App This is All app that I used to learn Name App Description knowledge in App //dice roll Roll Dice Roll! //about me Nguyen Huynh Thanh Red star Hi, my name is Thanh. \n\nI love Dragon. \n\nWhen I was young, I watched movies with Dragons, I always admired and liked them. They look very majestic, brave and powerful. \nAt that time, I honestly wanted a dragon of my own. \n\nLater, I learned that Dragons are not real in the present. They are legends described by previous humans. \nSo Dragons in Asia are different from Dragons in Europe. European Dragons have wings, big legs, and torso like dinosaurs. And the Asian Dragon is as long as a snake, has four legs and no wings. \n\nPeople still make movies about them today. And they are still fascinating legends when they appear in movies. Viewers, big or small, are still longing to see them once in real life. I myself, too. \n\nI want to be strong and proud like a Dragon, to be free to live like them. Want to become great, go into someone\'s legend. I want to be a Dragon. \nMy nickname is T66, which means Thanh Dragons.\n\n What is your Nickname? Done //color my views Box One Box Two Box Three Box Four Box Five How to play: Tap the screen and buttons. RED YELLOW GREEN //android trivia Game Over Try Again? Position Select an Avatar Android Trivia Android Trivia will help remind you of important concepts you have learned and will learn in Android development.\n\nConsider modifying the questions and graphics to make this game your own! Select the answer from the options given. Each time you get an answer correct, you advance to the next question.\n\nIf you get the answer wrong, your game ends! You can return to the title screen using up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game.
